data.title: Wise Creek
data.text:
Welcome To The RM of Wise Creek No.77!

The RM of Wise Creek is located in the Southwest corner of Saskatchewan. It is approximately 65 kms south of Swift Current. It has a land area of approximately 840 square kilometers. In 2016 it supported a population of 205. The Special Service area of Admiral is within the municipality. The Village of Cadillac is within its borders but is has its own administration.

The RM of Wise Creek is based largely on agriculture-related activity. The range of agriculture activity extends from grain farming, mixed grain/livestock to intensive livestock operations. The RM's resources lay largely in its excellent agricultural land base. We offer competitive taxation rates.

The municipal office is located within the Town of Shaunavon which is located along Highway 37.
